TopicTitle: Tribute to John Glenn: Flight of the Friendship 7

Articles.Content:
I was sad when I heard that he had died, so I made a tribute to him in KSP. I know it isn't completely accurate of perfect, but I though that if I died, I wouldn't care how I was honored so I went ahead with the mission. This is not meant to be anything except respectful.

Craft Download: https://kerbalx.com/JacobJHC/John-Glenns-Rocket

That was cute. Well done.

To bad the Kerbal was not named JohnGlenn Kerman.  Let's just say he is.
